description: Home delivery facilitates the configuration of locations, prices, and delivery times for orders. It allows detailed management of delivery points and associated costs. Optimizes the customer experience by offering flexibility and convenience in receiving products.
create: Select active destinations for home delivery.
emptyResult: No rules have been added yet. In the “Add rule” option configure some if necessary

enabled.0_CITY: Shipping enabled for the entire city (Global)
enabled.2_COUNTRY: Shipping enabled for the entire country (Global)
enabled.1_STATE: Shipping enabled for the entire province (Global)

shippingDisabled.title: Enable home delivery
shippingDisabled.description: to be able to add new locations

emptyLocations.title: No locations added yet!
emptyLocations.description: Add your first location to start managing shipments efficiently. Click the button and get started now!

activeDescription: In this modality, the warehouse operator guarantees home delivery of orders.

additionalCost.title: Additional cost for product features
additionalCost.description: It applies to products that, due to their physical characteristics, may make transportation to their destination difficult.
